denied.title: Location Access Blocked
denied.description: Your browser has blocked location access. Follow these steps to enable it:

step1.title: Click the lock icon
step1.description: Click the lock or shield icon next to the website URL in your browser's address bar

step2.title: Allow location access
step2.description: Find 'Location' in the permissions list and change it to 'Allow'

step3.title: Refresh the page
step3.description: Reload this page to try again

browserInstructions.title: Browser-specific Instructions
browserInstructions.chrome: Click the lock icon → Site settings → Location → Allow
browserInstructions.firefox: Click the shield icon → Permissions → Location → Allow
browserInstructions.safari: Safari menu → Preferences → Websites → Location → Allow

items: Location data (when you choose to share)

purposes: Respond to your inquiries and support requests

rights: Access and review your personal information

deadlines.title: Tax Deadline Reminder

deadlines.reminderTip3: Keep important documents organized throughout the year
deadlines.reminderTip4: Consult tax professionals for complex situations
deadlines.disclaimerText: This reminder system provides general tax deadline information. Actual deadlines may vary due to personal circumstances, extension applications, and other factors. Please refer to the latest information from official tax authorities and consult professional tax advisors for complex situations.
deadlines.selectCountryToView: Please select countries to view tax deadlines

strategyGuide.title: Tax Strategy Guide

nhrPortugal.title: Portugal NHR Program (2024 Update)
nhrPortugal.description: 10-year preferential tax rate, but policy has been significantly tightened, limited to high-skilled professions

requirements: Or high-skilled profession with annual income €75,000+
Reside in Portugal for 183+ days per year
Not a Portuguese tax resident in the past 5 years
